thread.title_full: Benghazi Hearing Clinton Testimony Live Stream | Politics

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Benghazi Hearing Clinton Testimony Live Stream | Politics
text:
(Before It's News)
Hillary Clinton’s testimony before Rep. Trey Gowdy (R-SC) 81% ‘s committee begins at 10am ET today. We have the livestream here – you can watch it by clicking below and stream it to your computer or mobile device.
Due to the comments by McCarthy and Hanna, and due to the fact that Hillary is now a bona fide presidential contender (instead of an expected one), this hearing will likely be more watched and scrutinized than any that have come before it.
Consider this an open thread about the hearing in the comments.
The post Benghazi Hearing Clinton Testimony Live Stream appeared first on RedState .
